content.title: Explore the App
content.body:
1. After you have installed the app, open the app.
    From the Volt MX JavaScript Debugger Configuration window, select Cancel.
  2. Enter the following login credentials in your app.
    • Username: john.doe@woodburn.com
    • Password: VoltMX@123
  3. Click Login.
    The Account list appears.
  4. Click Recipients. 
    The Recipient list appears.
  5. Click Add(+), to add a recipient to your account.
  6. Select a recipient from the list to view their details.
    From the details page, you can edit or delete the recipient.
